data.text: -Guys, this weekend is Daylight Savings Time

data.text: which means we all get to sleep in an extra hour on Sunday.

data.text: Gayle King said that she's still encouraging Oprah

data.text: -Guys, the news is so crazy lately

title: Gayle King Is Pushing Oprah to Run for President
